amendment.description: Amendment deletes section 122 which prohibits funds from being used to establish a National Wildlife Refuge in the Yolo Bypass of California.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike Sec. 122 from the bill. Sec. 122 prohibits funds to be used for establishing a National Wildlife Refuge in the Yolo Bypass of California.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ose amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
